Jx.Slide

Hides and shows an element without depending on a fixed width or height

Copyright 2009 by Jonathan Bomgardner License: MIT-style

Summary
Jx.SlideHides and shows an element without depending on a fixed width or height
Options
targetThe element to slide
triggerThe element that will have a click event added to start the slide
typeThe type of slide.
setOpenToAllows the caller to determine what the open target is set to.
onSlideOutfunction called when the target is revealed.
onSlideInfunction called when a panel is hidden.
Functions
slideActually determines how to slide and initiates the animation.

Options

target

The element to slide

trigger

The element that will have a click event added to start the slide

type

The type of slide.  Can be either “width” or “height”. defaults to “height”

setOpenTo

Allows the caller to determine what the open target is set to.  Defaults to ‘auto’.

onSlideOut

function called when the target is revealed.

onSlideIn

function called when a panel is hidden.

Functions

slide

slide: function (dir)

Actually determines how to slide and initiates the animation.

Parameters

dirthe direction to slide (either “in” or “out”)
slide: function (dir)
Actually determines how to slide and initiates the animation.
